Package weather

Class GridpointForecast

java.lang.Object
weather.GeoJson
weather.GridpointForecast
public class GridpointForecast extends GeoJson
A wrapper for the GridpointForecast schema of the NWS API
Author:
cobalt

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GridpointForecast(Office wfo, int x, int y)
    Creates a gridpoint forecast from the WFO the point's X and Y positions on the WFO's grid.
